context: I took credit for your idea
letters:
Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this note finds you well. I’ve been reflecting on our recent conversation, and I feel compelled to reach out and express my sincerest apologies. 

I am truly sorry for taking credit for your idea. It was a moment of weakness on my part, and I regret not giving you the recognition you deserve. Your creativity and hard work are the foundation of that idea, and I understand how unfair it was for me to overshadow your contribution.

Please know that it was never my intention to diminish your efforts or hurt our friendship. I value you not only as a talented friend but also as someone I respect deeply. I’ve learned a significant lesson from this experience, and I promise to be more mindful in the future.

If you’re open to it, I’d love the opportunity to discuss this further and find a way to make it right. You deserve to be acknowledged for your brilliance, and I want to ensure that you receive the recognition that’s rightfully yours.

Thank you for your understanding and for being such a remarkable friend. I hope we can move forward from this and continue to support each other in our endeavors.

With heartfelt apologies,  
[Your Name]

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I’ve been doing a lot of thinking, and I need to express my sincerest apologies for what I did. I can’t shake the guilt of taking credit for your idea, and I realize how hurtful that must have been to you.

You’ve always been such a supportive friend, and I deeply regret betraying that trust. Your idea was brilliant, and you deserved all the recognition for it. In my eagerness to showcase something I believed in, I completely overlooked the importance of giving you the credit you rightfully earned.

I want you to know how truly sorry I am for my actions. It was thoughtless of me, and I wish I could take it back. I value our friendship immensely, and I don’t want this mistake to overshadow the bond we’ve built.

If you’re open to it, I’d love the opportunity to discuss this further and make amends. I promise to learn from this and ensure it never happens again. Your friendship means the world to me, and I hope we can move forward from this.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope to hear from you soon.

Warmest regards,

[Your Name]
